title: FarStone TotalRecovery Pro 10.5.3 Build 20150508+Keygen-AppzDam
description:
For more info visit : appzdam.net

Meet FarStone TotalRecovery Pro - software package for comprehensive protection of your computer from the operating system corruption and data loss. The program performs backup and recovery of images, photos, music, videos, documents and other things. Also, it can make an image of your operating system to malfunction and  or virus attacks. This will make a full (and fast) recovery system, damaged as a result of user or software errors, driver failure or exposure to viruses.
The program is fully integrated with Windows and works so that workflows and Windows is not slowing down.

This program - a very reliable means to fully protect your computer from unwanted or unexpected system failure.
It can back up any file on your computer - photos, email, video, audio, and other documents.

The program also includes a built-in complex tools for backup and recovery, including backup of the entire system, a separate folder or a specific file, as well as an incremental backup image of the system.
It supports automatic backup scheduler, convenient and flexible transfer of information from one medium to another, or another system, and restore the data on any hardware.

TotalRecovery engine uses WinPE, which allows you to manage tasks before loading the operating system, namely, you can create a LiveCD or LiveUSB with support for both methods download: MBR + UEFI, and to start with it if you can not boot the system to restore it from the image.

In addition, the boot area can be written and a special download manager and recovery, which will be used to boot the OS and perform the same functions.

Features :

- Instant backup (disk image) and recovery.
- A smooth transition to a new hard drive.
- Extract files from the system unusable with the integrated Recovery Manager.
- Restore to different hardware.
- Easily transfer from HDD to SSD.
- Easy upgrade HDD.
- Restore data from CD / DVD.
- Cloning of a disk of any size.
- Backups can be stored on any device (HDD, USB, CD / DVD, FTP-server, network drive, NAS).
- Rescue files from accidental deletion.
- Protection from viruses that delete files or break their performance.
- Create an automatic backup scheduler.
- Protect any kind of file, including documents, photos, email, video, audio, and other important files.
- Native support P2V and VMware P2V.
- Remote backup redundancy on FTP .
- AES 256 encryption.
- Support for PXE.
- The event log.
- Support for Windows PE.

What's new :

Preview contents in backup images with Windows file explorer
Create bootable USB (CD) from current system (Dynamic PE generation)
Backup boot devices settings
Backup to clouds, such as SkyDrive, Google drive, and Dropbox
New repair tools for repairing boot issues
Support Windows Encryption File System (EFS)
Support VHDx virtual machine
Export logs & jobs
Max performance with true 64-bit

Notes :

1. Install the program.
2. Enter the serial number generated (select TotalRecovery Pro v10).

This crack with version 9, the new dialogs and strings are not translated!
For Russification, copy the contents of a folder rus, in the program folder. (Replacing halyards)
